nodes.text: S. Gawley was a Senior Construction Designer at the Imperial Navy Research, Development and Engineering Center, as well as at the Corellian Engineering Corporation Research, Development and Engineering Center, the Incom Corporation Research, Development and Engineering Center, and the SoroSuub Corporation Research, Development and Engineering Center.

This individual worked on the Avenger's design, as well as on the X-34 landspeeder's design, the T-65 X-wing starfighter's design, and the basic design of the YT-1300 light freighter that became the Millennium Falcon.
